title: Lassen Volcanic National Park: Goods & Services
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Goods & Services               Goods & Services       Services inside the Park Lodging options in the Park Drakesbad Guest Ranch - open early June through October Manzanita Lake Camping Cabins - open mid May through mid October Stores, Food, and Gasoline Lassen Cafe and Gift housed inside the Kohm Yah-mah-nee Visitor Center operates daily in the summer season. The Manzanita Lake Camper Store operates mid-May through mid-October. Gasoline is available at the Manzanita Lake Camper Store mid-May through mid-October. Showers and Laundry Coin-operated showers are available at the Manzanita Lake Camper Store mid-May through mid-October. Watercraft Rentals Kayak rentals are available at the Manzanita Lake Camper Store mid-May through mid-October. Horseback Riding Horseback riding is available at Drakesbad Guest Ranch. WiFi and Cell Phone Service WiFi is not available inside the park. Cell phone coverage is spotty due to the remote location of the park.  Services outside the Park The park is surrounded by local communities, where many goods and services are available; including gas stations, grocery stores, and other stores. Shasta Cascade Wonderland Association Lodging
